title: Sobre mim

Sobre mim

I am currently working as a consultant in Biostatistics in the field of genetics, i.e., proteomics, metabolomics, transcriptomics, etc. in Lille & Paris, France.
Additionally, I am also a freelance, available for hire to work on {{< iconify fa6-brands:r-project >}} and Quarto related projects.
I have developed a few {{< iconify fa6-brands:r-project >}}¬†packages (e.g.,¬†insane, NACHO), and although some are not very useful, they are most definitely entertaining (i.e.,¬†ggpacman).
I also enjoy watching movies () and playing with {{< iconify fa6-brands:r-project >}} (github.com/mcanouil/imdb-ratings).
Have a look at my complete {{< iconify fa6-regular file-lines >}} curriculum vitae.
